com.lukflug.panelstudio.component

Class DraggableComponent<T extends IFixedComponent>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.component.DraggableComponent<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the component type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IComponent, IComponentProxy<T>, IFixedComponent, IPopup
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HUDPanel

    public abstract class DraggableComponent<T extends IFixedComponent>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IComponentProxy<T>, IFixedComponent
    Fixed component wrapper that can be dragged by another component.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.awt.Point attachPoint
      Point storing the point, were the user started to drag the panel.
      protected boolean dragging
      Flag indicating whether the user is dragging the component with the mouse.
